verses.t: O God{H430}, thou hast cast us off{H2186}, thou hast scattered{H6555} us, thou hast been displeased{H599}; O turn thyself to us again{H7725}.Michtam: or, A golden Psalmscattered: Heb. broken
Thou hast made the earth{H776} to tremble{H7493}; thou hast broken{H6480} it: heal{H7495} the breaches{H7667} thereof; for it shaketh{H4131}.
Thou hast shewed{H7200} thy people{H5971} hard things{H7186}: thou hast made us to drink{H8248} the wine{H3196} of astonishment{H8653}.
Thou hast given{H5414} a banner{H5251} to them that fear{H3373} thee, that it may be displayed{H5127} because{H6440} of the truth{H7189}. Selah{H5542}.
That thy beloved{H3039} may be delivered{H2502}; save{H3467} with thy right hand{H3225}, and hear{H6030} me.
God{H430} hath spoken{H1696} in his holiness{H6944}; I will rejoice{H5937}, I will divide{H2505} Shechem{H7927}, and mete out{H4058} the valley{H6010} of Succoth{H5523}.
Gilead{H1568} is mine, and Manasseh{H4519} is mine; Ephraim{H669} also is the strength{H4581} of mine head{H7218}; Judah{H3063} is my lawgiver{H2710};
Moab{H4124} is my washpot{H7366}; over Edom{H123} will I cast out{H7993} my shoe{H5275}: Philistia{H6429}, triumph{H7321} thou because of me.triumph…: or, triumph thou over me: (by an irony)
Who will bring{H2986} me into the strong{H4692} city{H5892}? who will lead{H5148} me into Edom{H123}?strong…: Heb. city of strength?
Wilt not thou, O God{H430}, which hadst cast us off{H2186}? and thou, O God{H430}, which didst not go out{H3318} with our armies{H6635}?
Give{H3051} us help{H5833} from trouble{H6862}: for vain{H7723} is the help{H8668} of man{H120}.help of man: Heb. salvation, etc
Through God{H430} we shall do{H6213} valiantly{H2428}: for he it is that shall tread down{H947} our enemies{H6862}.
